Title: Requires that subpoenas relating to election matters be served with a separate informational sheet that summarizes why the subpoena has been issued
Summary: Requires that subpoenas issued relating to election matters be served with a separate informational sheet that summarizes why the subpoena has been issued.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring that subpoenas relating to election matters be served with a separate informational sheet that summarizes why the subpoena has been issued
